讚喔

재밌다. 사람들과 즐긴다는 게임의 기본을 충실히 잘 지키고 있다. 긴장감도 충분하고 파고들 요소도 많다. 잔렉과 버그는 좀 많은 편이지만, 꾸준히 업데이트 하는 것 같다. 다만 할로윈 이벤트를 좀 잘못 기획하는 등, 기획력에 있어서는 조금 부족한 역량을 보이지만 그럼에도 불구하고 값어치는 충분하기에 구매를 망설일 이유는 없는 게임이다.
2만원에 세일 없이 사서 배아프다.

Spent most time queuing as a survivor super long loading times and after all the wait someone disconnects.

Hunt your friends and some strangers in a game of 'Hide & Go Seek' with screaming, or try the other end of the blade and run for your life with a team of 4 working to get your asses out the mess your in.

这个游戏让我最惊讶的地方在于。在这个几乎没有社交渠道的 甚至可以说制作有点粗糙的联机游戏里，网恋人数居然不亚于国内某些大型相亲网游。

别的游戏撩妹也许需要送时装，刷道具，买装备等等各种烧钱操作。
但是在黎明杀机里，你也许只需要一根针，一次扛刀，你就能俘获心仪的TA的心。
(^u^) 所以说黎明相亲哪家强？

친구랑 듀오하기에 정말 멋진 게임이에요. 게임의 전반적인 환경이나 사운드는 정말 무섭지만, 그러면서도 침착하게 하나하나 발전기를 돌려 탈출했을 때 짜릿짜릿한 쾌감!!! 랭크 시스템이 조금 의아스러운(?) 게임이지만, 저에겐 너무나 신선하고 새로운 게임이었습니다. ㅎ

Updates are a total mess that doesn't work. For days. Unbalanced MM and some terrible confusing maps with many dead ends. 
Playing as Killer with a certain disadvantage bc survivors can just evade you until you get tired of waiting, there is no game timer.  Killers and their perks are in constant danger of getting nerfed by whining sirvivor mains, killing half of the game. 

Still, very good voice acting and easy Bloodpoint grind, also no annoying "win"missions like so many games.

Great Game! Been occasionaly playing now and again and every game so far has been a different experience. From An easy game with a brain dead myers to a game filled with screaming at my friends as the one trick huntress camps me on the basement hook. The game reallly knows how to make every type of person fel every imaginable emotion at once
Muita legal! Me diverti super com meus amiguinhos lindos! Recomendo muito! 5 estrelas porque só tem até 5 senão seria 10000 estrelas!
10/10 will play again
Desbalanceado, Comunidade mais tóxica, cheio de glitch (cegueira infinita, bug visual, etc.) e servidores lagados.

A decent and fun game with a broken lobby system. The first 3 games as a survivor where good. I just survived one of them, but it was still fair and fun. But then the rest of them were just awfull. There were just 3 types of killers then: 1. 300-400 ping 2.camped everyone who was on a hook 3. Killer disconnects right after we spawn in or 4. had 300+ hours, rank 1 on survivor, dlc killer, an ebony mori, all 4 perks maxed out (purple and with this 3 marks) and found you within the first 20 seconds of the match.
But if they fix the loby system (and some technical issues), then it is a very good game.
P.S. Sorry fo my bad grammar and I'm not trying to cry that the game is bad, but I just want to play as a beginner agains beginners. Because thats what lvl. or ranks are for.

Gra ogólnie na papierze bardzo fajna i polecam ją dla ludzi cierpliwych. Inni dostaną szału ze względu na długi czas oczekiwania na innych graczy. Nie rozumiem dlaczego jako survivor łączę się w kilka sekund a jako killer... w ogóle się nie łączę. Serio, czekam w tej kolejce i czekam... i nic.

A szkoda, bo gra naprawdę wydaje się spoko.
Macht sehr viel Spaß. Kann nichts negatives berichten, außer dass es immer gewisse Leute gibt, die einen einfach nur abcampen.

Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer game where one player takes on the role of the Lag Switching Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape while taunting the Killer and avoid being caught and killed, in hope that the other three Survivors are not working together with the Killer.

If you think that the price tag is a joke, you should take a look at the report system and the list of bannable offenses.
I strongly recommend you to spend your time and money at something else.
This is a great game. It's got to be one of the most immersive games I've ever played.

So this is probably going to sound weird. Even though I enjoy playing the game, I would not recommend it. It is a very unfriendly game for a new player. The community is extremely hateful and self entitled that unless you main a Killer, Survivor players will only really enjoy it if they have 3 other friends to play with. With that in mind, I'll go into details in Pros, and cons regarding the game itself.

:Pros:
-A fun cat and mouse game that's relatively 'simple'. Kill the Survivors, or Escape.
-A wide variety of Killers of various horrors, and guest fighters/killers like Micheal Myers. The characters ARE interesting, and even likable.
-The Survivors are all the same, they simply look different, and have different perks so play whoever you like.
-There's a legit catharsis factor for both sides. Successfully killing all 4 Survivors can feel very satisfying, while slamming a Killer who won't leave you alone with a Pallet can feel great, and of course, escaping.
-In the worst situation for Survivors, near the end of the game a Hatch will appear as their numbers dwindle. The last Survivor has no chance of fixing the gens, but he can find the hatch to possibly escape. This isn't a foolproof plan though, the Killer can close the hatch, but hey, you got a chance still, also you might be lucky and have a key.


:Cons:

-The Community. I played a lot of online games, a lot of MMOs. This games community is so far, the absolute worst one I've seen. Period. Lots of people who are just looking to harass you over nothing. It's actually because of these people I've had to make my profile for alittle while because they don't stop harassing your comment sections. They're petty, obnoxious, and you're just better off just not engaging anyone in discussion.

-Every Killer functions very differently and you'll need a lot of practice to learn how each one functions, either playing as them, or against them. There's almost 20 different killers at the moment this review is originally made. This is like a living nightmare for new survivors as one of your main keys to survival is knowing how a Killer works.

-Some of the cosmetics and characters are just terrible, and impractical. Jane for example is notably thicker compared to others, easier to spot behind trees. Then you got bright, pink clothes hiding in the dark. I think you can imagine how this is bad for blending in. Killers can also suffer from this, but hiding isn't as vital for them.

-The horror aspect grows weak as you keep playing. For a Survivor in the beginning it's scary hearing your heartbeat as the Killer draws closer, but quickly loses it's scare factor after the first few games. You might still get a good startle from certain killers popping out of nowhere, but very mild.

-Long waiting queues.

-So much DLC, The base game only has a few Killers, and survivors on the roster for you to play but expect you to buy pack, after pack. This wouldn't be so bad if they just bundled them up after all this time. It's also cheaper to simply buy the game shop currency and just grab 1 character vs the bundle for people you probably don't want. Like Ace and Hag, Hag is okay, but Ace is pretty weak. You also won't get a chance to Demo these Killers.You can obtain a leveling up currency to unlock characters, but only Originals, and the level currency price is staggeringly high.

-Perks, jeez, these perks...Okay so remember how I said this game is very unfriendly for newbies? Imagine playing your first game as Killer, you got 1 perk, in it's weakest level. You are 99% likely to go up against survivors who already have the best perks they can get and set up at max level. New players are in for a severe hazing as they will need to go through a long grind to rack up points, and earn perks that will help them. Oh and of course, you have to mix and match the perks from multiple characters for a good set. So you best have your wallet ready for that as well. Every character you need to level 30-40 to unlock the perks for other characters, which will cost hundreds of thousands of blood points, which you can earn up to 32K + Modifiers in a really good game. On average you'll probably earn 6K-24K depending on how you play. Yes, I know, you can be patient and hope the games shop has the perks available on the weekly shrine that uses leveling currency, but good luck getting the perks you want anytime soon.

-The Rift, an incredibly obnoxious cash grab by the developers. Dozens of levels for you to grind through slowly to unluck cosmetic rewards. You can buy a PREMIUM for it which doesn't even speed up the leveling. No, you have to marathon the ever loving hell out of this game, and I mean marathon it. Clear up your schedule if you wanna get these goodies, and break open that wallet. You can actually pay EVEN MORE to auto-level it, but again, you're only doing this for cosmetics. Might as well just be a middle finger to you as a player.

-Matchmaking is utterly broken! You can have a greenhorn rank 20 run into games with rank 5 opponents, even though the lower ranking indicates this guy has been playing for quite awhile. Not only that, but you can easily de-rank yourself so you can bully newer players more frequently.

-The Hit Boxes can be pretty wonky. Like if you clearly should have hit that person but somehow you don't, or when the killer is like a mile away, and still land that hit somehow. Huntress suffers this the most with her ranged attack, sometimes hitting junk for no reason, or somehow going through said junk! It's a notable con cause the messed up hit can really mess up your composure, even some of the most popular, and seasoned streamers have a "WTF?!" moment cause of it from time to time.

-Cheating is very common with Survivor groups. The idea is that you don't know who, or where the killer is until you figure it out, and have to find your friends with your own skills. Instead players in groups usually use Discord or what have you, relaying all sorts of information to one another. One of the Killers best weapons is the element of surprise, so having the team constantly reporting sightings can severely hurt the Killers experience. Despite it not being fair for Killers, these jackasses will justify it by saying the Killers are OP to start with, which isn't even true. Every Killer can be beat, period. It's unfortunately not a bannable offense as it seems no one, not even the Mods know if it counts as actual cheating or not. Good luck proving they were anyways. There's also been reports of wall hacks, speed hacks, and hacked perks. I've personally had to deal with a few of these.

Crappy Killers: Okay so plenty of these guys look/sound good on paper, sometimes they WERE good until they were quickly ruined by patches/nerfs. Legion for example got hit the hardest. Originally when he could use his ability and not worry about missing, but now if he misses, he's going to get stunned. Combine that with the bad hitbox mentioned earlier, Survivors easily ruin the entire point of the power with what's called a Juke, it's like a quick timing bit where they dance in a circle to mess up your aiming.


The game IS fun to play, I wouldn't say fun enough to marathon, but unless you know exactly how to start off, you are in for a very long, rough hazing, you will be harassed, it will not be enjoyable. What's funny is this isn't a problem on console. On console the players aren't as intense and you have a much easier time settling in with your Killers/Survivors without needing to invest money for other characters for their perks. If you have a choice between Console, or PC, for the love of god go PC.

I give the PS4 version an 8 out of 10, but the PC a 4.5 out of 10. I would recommend it on Console, but not PC.

第一次写游戏评测，刚入手没多久，先说说体验。
1，目前遇见两次守尸的人，这种情况多还是不多我不清楚，只是这样真的很没有意思，体感游戏很差劲哦。
2，一上就掉线的人，一被挂就马上选择死的人，基本上五局里出现三局，你挂上了不要乱动，我会来救你。
3，不要放弃哦，我已经不知道死了多少次，从来没有逃出生天，但还是一直锻炼自己坚持下去。结果就遇见了今天的两局：
今天连续两局，真的是连续两局哦，我们逃生四人组，被护士疯狂的撵杀，护士边撵杀，其余的两个人就开始轮流扶，挡着木桩子不让挂，不然就跟着护士身后等她挂上，再扶起来，不知道这样的轮回继续多了多久，在这期间我们发动了电，成功的打开了逃生的门，虽然期间还是不断接受护士的撵杀，也不知道护士的同情心发作还是被我们感动的，护士在撵杀的过程中目送了我们离开。

新开的第二局，没多久还没等我们救两个人就死了，第三个人也是一样刚挂上树没等我救就选择速死，就剩下我一个人，真的是，想送死但是又不甘，默默的去发电，看到炸毛（怨灵）来了，我心想我完了，一边想完了一边受伤的跑，怨灵追上我打趴下了，抱起我后就开始挣扎，挣扎的过程中又把我摔在地上，我以为这人耍着我玩，然后又抱起我来，又把我摔在地上，然后我居然莫名其妙的站起来了，我跑啊跑啊，后面追啊追，然后又把我两次摔到了刚才发电的地方，我有点理解了，意思让我继续发电吧，然后看着我发完电，我就站着等他挂树，结果炸毛没反应，我就跑啊跑，炸毛又后面追啊追，炸毛又把我砍倒了，心想行吧行吧，你想怎么耍我我都奉陪，结果炸毛抱着我把我扔到 一个地下 通道门口，我鼠标一点，我。。。。感动的稀里哗啦。。。顺手点了个赞，写了句i love u thank u very much（(✿o(*￣▽￣*)ブ)。

感谢这些人让游戏玩的更有意思，谢谢你，我是萌新，请多多关照。

[h1]Dead by Daylight, como eu amo e odeio esse joguinho... (Atualizado 25/01/20)[/h1]

[b]O que é o jogo em si?[/b]
Dead by Daylight é um jogo assimétrico de 4 versus 1 onde há quatro sobreviventes e um assassino, os sobreviventes devem energizar um portão de saída por meio de geradores (Geralmente 5) e fugir, simples, não? Porém há um assassino que tem como principal objetivo impedir que os sobreviventes tentem fazer geradores e eventualmente fujam, o assassino deve enganchar os sobreviventes algumas vezes para mata-los.

[b]Por que é um joguinho gostosinho?[/b]
Pode parecer repetitivo, fazer geradores, geradores, geradores... Ou como assassino, apenas matar, mas a cada partida há estratégias diferentes, jogadores diferentes. Então isso é bem interessante, além que o jogo é atualizado com mais assassinos novos, mapas novos e sobreviventes novos, o que cria ainda mais estilos variados de se jogar.

[b]Pontos Positivos[/b]
Apenas colocarei alguns tópicos simples:

[b]- Servidor Dedicado Brasileiro[/b]
[b]- Sistema top de passe[/b]
[b]- Missões e Desafios[/b]
[b]- Eventos[/b]

[b]Pontos Negativos[/b]
Esses explicarei melhor sobre o meu ponto:

[b]Bugs:[/b] [u]"I think we did a pretty good joob so far"[/u] Os bugs... Os desenvolvedores costumam resolver com frequência? Mais ou menos, quando há uma atualização de contéudo muitos exploits aparecem e bugs, ao longo do tempo vão resolvendo.

[b]Problema de Lobby:[/b] Na versão atual do DBD, há um problema onde sobreviventes próximos do rank 20 acham partidas bem mais rápido que alguém do rank 1 e com o killer o contrário, sendo o rank 1 mais rápido e o 20 bem demorado (10 min aproximadamente)

[b]Comunidade Tóxica:[/b] Bem, Dead by Daylight não tem uma boa comunidade, muitos jogadores não sabem jogar de forma saudável e divertida para ambos os lados, não canso de ver um sobrevivente ficar caçoando do assassino, fazendo o famoso "teabag", ou vendo jogadores se xingando no final do lobby

[b]Conclusão[/b]
É um jogo muito top que tem seus pontos positivos, porém infelizmente tem alguns desses pontos negativos que precisam ser melhorados pelos desenvolvedores

Возможно после релиза патча сейчас игра не играбельная смысл играть в ее нету и покупать допы тоже потому как в них нету смысла они ничего не решают.

Игра крутая, потому что разрабы не клали на неё свой огромный ху й, хорошая графика, сюжет классный, где 4 выживших чинят генераторы, чтобы сбежать, а убийца должен принести их в жерству сущности. Единственное минус это люки. Стоило сделать так, чтобы их открыть нужно было время (не столько, сколько чинить генератор, по меньше) + убийце было бы лучше его видеть через все объекты, как генераторы. Итог: 4 из 5
very good and impressive game. i recommend this game so much

屎一样的服务器，之前我还真没有被哪一款游戏气的给差评的，这是第一款，连尼玛30分钟都上不去，加速器也没用，买了就是个摆设，对于新手来说也很不友好，选人跑不过，选屠夫杀不了人，匹配机制烂的一批。建议谨慎入。
